en-US.description: AskPlex is an Alexa skill which allows you to play music hosted by your plex media server
examplePhrases: Alexa ask AskPlex to play some music
Alexa ask AskPlex to play rock music
en-US.name: AskPlex
en-US.summary: Skill for playing music from your media server

es-US.description: AskPlex es una skill de alexa que permite reproducir música almacenada en tu servidor de medios plex
examplePhrases: Alexa pide a AskPlex pon música
Alexa pide a AskPlex pon música rock
es-US.name: AskPlex
